backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with cruise deals, itineraries, bookings, reviews, alerts, branding settings, and access control state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summarized descriptions of all major frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring theme, query client, layout, shared itinerary routing, and global dialogs/toasts.
Displays toast notifications for new unviewed admin booking alerts.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog showing alerts, bookings, logo management, and branding settings with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Dialog for viewing caller role, principal ID, and assigning admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Modal for selecting cabins and submitting a booking, including cost calculation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Displays a cruise deal card with image, details, favorite toggle, and itinerary dialog support.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface to add, edit, preview, and delete cruise line logos using file uploads and queries.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Shows a grid of cruise line partner logos or skeletons while loading.
Dialog listing the user’s favorite cruise deals with loading states and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and displays featured cruise deals in an auto‑scrolling carousel with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social links, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, user auth actions, admin controls, and dialogs for favorites, bookings, and admin tools.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full‑width hero section with background image, marketing text, action buttons, and cruise statistics.
Dialog showing detailed cruise itinerary with tabs, reviews, booking, sharing, and PDF generation options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Displays cruise reviews and allows authenticated users to create, edit, and delete their own reviews.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Search and filter interface for cruise deals with query input, filters, sliders, and result listing.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a public itinerary view with branding, images, and ship info, handling loading and invalid-link states.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Provides a settings form for customizing shared page branding and saving or resetting branding values.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Shows a dialog listing the user's bookings with status, dates, and itinerary details, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise deals, itineraries, user data, bookings, reviews, and branding settings using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes plus custom ocean/sunset palettes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Provides functions to validate color strings and safely apply them to styles or fallback classes.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable PDF-style HTML window for an itinerary with structured styling.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Defines default branding and merges stored branding settings with fallback values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theming with OKLCH CSS variable–based colors, plugins, and custom palettes.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, issues, and architectural notes for the current build state.
